reviews.review: This game is destroying my social life. Still recommend. (Help me)

Playing since the Beta still one of the best, 
Shooting sensation are great
The games got strong matchmaking with a lot of features community server with custom mods
Lots of weapons
Paying part since it goes F2P doesn't affect gameplay 
Just skins as every game should do

trash garbage with hackers every where

rakat szar de azért játszok vele nehogy kihaljon a community...............

csgo is eternal
very fun to play with/against friends
Игра хорошая, но нужен античит, ждем!

game matches genuine good players against cheaters, absolute fuc.king bullshit anti cheat system, it is actually possible to wall and not get banned (yea somehow). For some fu.cked reason the game gives prime to players who've reached level 21 in csgo and decided it will be a good idea to put them in mm with ppl who've got the loyal badges and actually purchased csgo, making the cheater situation even worse. Kreeg was broken for such a fuc.king long time, after upon finally fixing it, the bit.ches at valve decide to break another weapon instead like the dgle, making it no longer a genuine skill weapon, u can fu.cking spam it like a p90 and get frags out of it. We still running on 64 tick and valorant already got 128tick.
i g i e l k a

An extremely cool game for this lockdown period. You won't even feel it where the time goes away.

vey good game for free worth every Gb
